verses.verse: וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> vai-ya-Kam there arose אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei And after אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <WH40> 'a-vi-Me-lech Abimelech לְהוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> le-ho-Shi-a' to defend אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Israel תּוֹלָ֧ע <WH8439> to-La' Tola בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פּוּאָ֛ה <WH6312> pu-'Ah of Puah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son דּוֹד֖וֹ <WH1734> do-Do of Dodo אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish a man יִשָּׂשכָ֑ר <WH3485> yis-so-sh-Char; of Issachar וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> ve-hu- and he יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> yo-Shev and he dwelt בְּשָׁמִ֖יר <WH8069> be-sha-Mir in Shamir בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim. Ephraim

וַיִּשְׁפֹּט֙ <WH8199> vai-yish-Pot And he judged אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וְשָׁלֹ֖שׁ <WH7969> ve-sha-Losh and three שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> sha-Nah; years וַיָּ֖מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot and died וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <WH6912> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried בְּשָׁמִֽיר׃ <WH8069> be-sha-Mir. in Shamir פ Peh

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom him arose אַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav, And after יָאִ֖יר <WH2971> ya-'Ir Jair הַגִּלְעָדִ֑י <WH1569> hag-gil-'a-Di; a Gileadite וַיִּשְׁפֹּט֙ <WH8199> vai-yish-Pot and judged אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Israel עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> u-she-Ta-yim and two שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. years

וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> vay-hi- had ל֞וֹ lo שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim And he had thirty בָּנִ֗ים <WH1121> ba-Nim, sons רֹֽכְבִים֙ <WH7392> ro-che-Vim that rode עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> she-lo-Shim on thirty עֲיָרִ֔ים <WH5895> 'a-ya-Rim, ass colts וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim and they had thirty עֲיָרִ֖ים <WH5895> 'a-ya-Rim donkeys לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> la-Hem; like לָהֶ֞ם <WH1992> la-Hem that יִקְרְא֣וּ׀ <WH7121> yik-re-'U which are called חַוֹּ֣ת chav-Vot יָאִ֗יר <WH2334> ya-'Ir, Havothjair עַ֚ד <WH5704> 'ad against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, to this אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher it בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz which [are] in the land הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad. of Gilead
וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died יָאִ֔יר <WH2971> ya-'Ir, And Jair וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> vai-yik-ka-Ver and was buried בְּקָמֽוֹן׃ <WH7056> be-ka-Mon. in Camon פ Peh

וַיֹּסִ֣פוּ׀ <WH3254> vai-yo-Si-fu again בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot did הָרַע֮ <WH7451> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֣וּ <WH5647> vai-ya-'av-Du and served אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבְּעָלִ֣ים <WH1168> hab-be-'a-Lim Baalim וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעַשְׁתָּר֡וֹת <WH6252> ha-'ash-ta-Rot and Ashtaroth וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods אֲרָם֩ <WH758> 'a-Ram of Syria וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods צִיד֜וֹן <WH6721> tzi-Don of Zidon וְאֵ֣ת׀ <WH853> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods מוֹאָ֗ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, of Moab וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon, of Ammon וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei and the gods פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim; of the Philistines וַיַּעַזְב֥וּ <WH5800> vai-ya-'az-Vu and forsook אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo and did not עֲבָדֽוּהוּ׃ <WH5647> 'a-va-Du-hu. and served

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> vai-yi-char- was hot אַ֥ף <WH639> 'af And the anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El; against Israel וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵם֙ <WH4376> vai-yim-ke-Rem and he sold בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- them into the hands פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וּבְיַ֖ד <WH3027> u-ve-Yad and into the hands בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> am-Mon. of Ammon

וַֽיִּרְעֲצ֤וּ <WH7492> vai-yir-'a-Tzu they vexed וַיְרֹֽצְצוּ֙ <WH7533> vay-ro-tze-Tzu and oppressed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah And that year הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> ha-Hi; he שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <WH8083> she-mo-Neh eight עֶשְׂרֵ֜ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, years אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- they all בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei all the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver that [were] on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den, Jordan בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בַּגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> bag-gil-'Ad. which [is] in Gilead

וַיַּעַבְר֤וּ <WH5674> vai-ya-'av-Ru passed over בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- Moreover the children עַמּוֹן֙ <WH5983> 'am-mOn of Ammon אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den, Jordan לְהִלָּחֵ֛ם <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem to fight גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also בִּיהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> bi-hu-Dah also against Judah וּבְבִנְיָמִ֖ין <WH1144> u-ve-vin-ya-Min and against Benjamin וּבְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> u-ve-Veit and against the house אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim; of Ephraim וַתֵּ֥צֶר <WH3334> vat-Te-tzer distressed לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El so that Israel מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. was sore

וַֽיִּזְעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> vai-yiz-'a-Ku cried בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying חָטָ֣אנוּ <WH2398> cha-Ta-nu We have sinned לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְכִ֤י <WH3588> ve-Chi for עָזַ֙בְנוּ֙ <WH5800> 'a-Zav-nu against thee both because we have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> van-na-'a-Vod and also served אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <WH1168> hab-be-'a-Lim. Baalim פ Peh

וַ֥יֹּאמֶר <WH559> Vai-yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> ha-Lo not מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim [Did] not [I deliver you] from the Egyptians וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- at הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, and from the Amorites וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- at בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei from the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon of Ammon וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- at פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> pe-lish-Tim. Philistine

וְצִידוֹנִ֤ים <WH6722> ve-tzi-do-Nim The Zidonians וַֽעֲמָלֵק֙ <WH6002> va-'a-ma-Lek also and the Amalekites וּמָע֔וֹן <WH4584> u-ma-'on, and the Maonites לָחֲצ֖וּ <WH3905> la-cha-Tzu did oppress אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; וַתִּצְעֲק֣וּ <WH6817> vat-titz-'a-Ku you and ye cried אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to וָאוֹשִׁ֥יעָה <WH3467> va-'o-Shi-'ah to me and I delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem מִיָּדָֽם׃ <WH3027> mi-ya-Dam. you out of their hand

וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> ve-'at-Tem you עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ם <WH5800> 'a-zav-Tem Yet ye have forsaken אוֹתִ֔י <WH853> o-Ti, וַתַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> vat-ta-'av-Du me and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> 'a-che-Rim; other לָכֵ֥ן <WH3651> la-Chen therefore לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- will no אוֹסִ֖יף <WH3254> o-Sif you no more לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> le-ho-Shi-a' wherefore I will deliver אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> 'et-Chem.

לְכ֗וּ <WH1980> le-Chu, Go וְזַֽעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> ve-za-'a-Ku and cry אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, unto the gods אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH977> be-char-Tem which ye have chosen בָּ֑ם Bam; הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah let them יוֹשִׁ֥יעוּ <WH3467> yo-Shi-'u deliver לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem בְּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> be-'Et you in the time צָרַתְכֶֽם׃ <WH6869> tza-rat-Chem. of your tribulation

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD חָטָ֔אנוּ <WH2398> cha-Ta-nu, We have sinned עֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> 'a-seh- do אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you לָ֔נוּ La-nu, כְּכָל־ <WH3605> ke-chol- whatever הַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> hat-Tov good בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei-cha; thou unto us whatsoever seemeth אַ֛ךְ <WH389> 'ach only הַצִּילֵ֥נוּ <WH5337> hatz-tzi-Le-nu unto thee deliver נָ֖א <WH4994> na please הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom us only we pray thee this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

וַיָּסִ֜ירוּ <WH5493> vai-ya-Si-ru And they put away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <WH5236> han-ne-Char the strange מִקִּרְבָּ֔ם <WH7130> mik-kir-Bam, from among וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> vai-ya-'av-Du them and served אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <WH7114> vat-tik-Tzar was grieved נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> naf-Sho and his soul בַּעֲמַ֥ל <WH5999> ba-'a-Mal for the misery יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

וַיִּצָּֽעֲקוּ֙ <WH6817> vai-yitz-tza-'a-Ku were gathered together בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei Then the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon, of Ammon וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בַּגִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> bag-gil-'Ad; in Gilead וַיֵּאָֽסְפוּ֙ <WH622> vai-ye-'a-se-Fu assembled themselves together בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and encamped בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> bam-mitz-Pah. in Mizpeh

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am And the people שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> sa-Rei [and] princes גִלְעָד֙ <WH1568> gil-'Ad of Gilead אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> re-'E-hu, to another מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish, What man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יָחֵ֔ל <WH2490> ya-Chel, [is he] that will begin לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem to fight בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> biv-Nei against the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon; Ammon יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לְרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> le-Rosh, head לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> le-Chol all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei over all the inhabitants גִלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> gil-'Ad. of Gilead פ Peh
